entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the evening and overnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 70 in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 19 January 2023
